prompt: Close-up studio shot, landscape orientation, of a meticulously arranged collection of rare vintage Fire-King Jade-ite glassware showcasing various patterns (Alice, Swirl, Restaurant Ware, Fleurette). Focus on details of the glass, highlighting the subtle color variations and pattern intricacies. Soft, diffused lighting to minimize harsh reflections and emphasize the smooth texture of the glass. Professional product photography style, high resolution, shallow depth of field to isolate specific pieces. --ar 16:9
name: rare-vintage-fire-king-pattern-identification-image-1.png

prompt: Overhead shot, landscape orientation, of a vintage kitchen table setting featuring a complete Fire-King 'Primrose' pattern dinnerware set. Tablecloth is a subtly patterned pastel color. Include vintage silverware, napkins, and a partially filled coffee pot. Natural light streaming in from a window to the left, creating soft shadows and highlights. Focus on conveying a sense of nostalgia and mid-century charm. Photorealistic rendering, high detail. --ar 16:9
name: rare-vintage-fire-king-pattern-identification-image-2.png

prompt: Macro photograph, landscape orientation, focusing on the base of a single, rare Fire-King 'Atomic Eyes' bowl. The shot should emphasize the embossed Anchor Hocking mark and any other identifying details on the bottom of the piece. Dramatic lighting from below to highlight the texture and form of the glass. Extremely shallow depth of field, blurring the background completely. The goal is to create a visually striking abstract image that also provides key identification information. --ar 16:9
name: rare-vintage-fire-king-pattern-identification-image-3.png

prompt: A brightly lit, landscape orientation image of a well-organized vintage kitchen cabinet filled with various pieces of Fire-King glassware in different colors and patterns. The cabinet should appear slightly worn but clean, suggesting a lived-in, loved collection. Focus on the arrangement and variety of pieces, showcasing the breadth of Fire-King's designs. Realistic rendering with a slightly desaturated color palette to enhance the vintage feel. --ar 16:9
name: rare-vintage-fire-king-pattern-identification-image-4.png

prompt: Landscape orientation image depicting a collector's hands carefully examining a rare Fire-King 'Blue Mosaic' casserole dish under a magnifying glass. The background is a blurred collection of other Fire-King pieces. The lighting should be focused on the dish and the hands, highlighting the detail of the pattern and the careful examination. Emphasize the passion and dedication of a collector in this image. Photorealistic, professional photography style. --ar 16:9
name: rare-vintage-fire-king-pattern-identification-image-5.png
